author: Xbox
description:
Introducing Project Justice and Plasma Sword: Nightmare of Bilstein, included in Capcom Fighting Collection 2!
----------
Project Justice
An intense story unfolds on the high school campus of this 3D fighter. This sequel to Rival Schools ensures justice is served with its 3-on-3 team battles! Devastate opponents with a cooperative Party-Up technique powered by your faith in your friends!

Plasma Sword: Nightmare of Bilstein
3D fighter Star Gladiator returns for a thrilling, out-of-this-world sequel! Battle as a galactic hero wielding a sword powered by plasma. Use character-specific Plasma Fields to briefly overwhelm your opponents, or unleash a Plasma Strike that devastates with a dazzling display. The enthralling story that unfolds in the cutscenes is not to be missed!
----------

The fight continues in Capcom Fighting Collection 2, packed with 8 iconic fighting games from across Capcom's history! Get ready to battle on May 16, 2025 on Xbox One. Pre-order now!

Capcom vs. SNK: Mill
title: Capcom Fighting Collection 2 - Game Spotlight Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
The future of The Elder Scrolls Online begins here! Join us for the 2025 ESO Direct as Studio Head Matt Firor and members of the development team showcase all the new adventures, systems, and changes coming to Tamriel this year. We have big plans for ESO in 2025—don’t miss out!

Visit elderscrollsonline.com for more information and all the latest reveals and news.

Official Site: https://www.elderscrollsonline.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ElderScrollsOnline
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TESOnline
Instagram: https://instagram.com/elderscrollsonline

ESRB Rating: MATURE with Blood and Gore, Sexual Themes, Use of Alcohol, and Violence. Online interactions not rated by the ESRB.
title: The Elder Scrolls Online - 2025 ESO Direct
